title: Leonard McCoy
summary: Dr. Leonard H. "Bones" McCoy is a character in the American science-fiction franchise Star Trek.[1] McCoy was played by actor DeForest Kelley in the original Star Trek series from 1966 to 1969, and he also appears in the animated Star Trek series, six Star Trek movies, the pilot episode of Star Trek: The Next Generation, and in numerous books, comics, and video games.[2] A decade after Kelley's death, The Lord of the Rings star Karl Urban assumed the role of McCoy in the Star Trek reboot film in 2009.[3]
